title: Australia Living Longer
content:
this was surpossed to be taken down a while ago, but channel 7 has been lazy which means australian should not miss out on this [url=http://livinglonger.seven.com.au/testintro.html]life expectancy text[/url] all you have to do is answer 45 questions & you will find out how long you should live

sorry for those who aren't aussie & therefore cannot take this test, for those who want to find out their life expectancy do a search in goggle i found quite a few results[url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]

WIPE OUT BUSH! WIPE OUT HOWARD!

title: Re: Australia Living Longer
content: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] Sorry, I've a feeling those tests aren't very accurate..You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Australia Living Longer
content: Yeah, i mean, 72.3? I don't think i'll live THAT long. I don't exercise, eat healthy or anything like that. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]
